markdownRemark.html:
After months of learning, I finally decided to use Gatsby to make my website instead of NuxtJS. For now, I like React more than Vue. I think maybe because I'm such a beginner of modern web development and React's docs are more friendly for beginner than Vue's (on my perspective).

And Gatsby is a powerful framework for React. I'm using it to make a film review website for my own brand '添糖电影院' on WeChat for weeks. The more I learn, the much I like it.

To improve the understanding of Gatsby, I'd love to join the #100DaysOfGatsby coding challenge. And today is the results for:

  • Challenge 1: Greate a Gatsby blog from scratch. I'm using the UIkit for CSS.
  • Challenge 2: Host my Gatsby site for free.

I'll use this blog to track my coding progress.
